商品名稱: ROSELINLIN 女款 短袖 襯衫 長袖 花卉 夏季 上衣 寬鬆 適合 內搭褲

留言內容: This blouse is beautiful. It is stitched well, not transparent, has a flattering cut, super comfy and I love it! The two buttons are a cute accent.  The material is soft and has elasticity but is nicely flowing.

商品名稱: ROSELINLIN 女款 短袖 襯衫 長袖 花卉 夏季 上衣 寬鬆 適合 內搭褲
留言內容: The material is soft, but not clingy. I checked the sewing and it's nicely done. I wear a size 12 and ordered a medium, which fit perfectly. The one thing I'm not totally sure about is th top button. It does kind of fit loosely there. However, it looks as if the model just leaves that open. So I'm not going to let that bother me. I bought the black multi floral and the colors are vivid. It's a keeper.

商品名稱: ROSELINLIN 女款 短袖 襯衫 長袖 花卉 夏季 上衣 寬鬆 適合 內搭褲
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: A Red White
留言內容: I like this top.  I have a bilateral mastectomy and did not have reconstruction.  This print and loose fit looks good and the buttons at the top add interest and help to camouflage my flat chest.  It's a very cute print.  The only things I would change is to have the sleeves a little larger.

留言內容: I have this top in over ten colors/patterns -- that should tell you how much I like it!  It fits nicely, but covers any unwanted lumps and bumps you may have (be it under the bra strap in back or a little "pooch" in the tummy area).  It's a great top to wear on a hot day as it doesn't cling, so if there's a breeze you can feel it.  The sleeves are very feminine and flattering.  For those of you who still have your monthly visitor or for those whose weight fluctuates a few pounds up or down, this top fits the bill and doesn't need to be put into your "skinny days" pile, which makes it great choice for vacations, too.

留言內容: I ordered this to replace a similar type shirt that has seen better days. The latter has been retired to a paint shirt due to the holes it has.
